summary: The diff largely implements the requested single-page landing redesign with preserved anchors, white background, glassmorphism nav-on-scroll, and multiple ambient motion elements with reduced-motion handling. However, it violates an explicit constraint by modifying an immutable file path, and the “single consistent blue accent only” requirement appears not fully enforced due to non-blue accent colors being introduced/kept in theme tokens and ambient effects.

missing_requirements.requirement: Constrain the color system so that all non-white accents use a single consistent shade of blue and avoid introducing additional accent hues.
missing_requirements.reason: Theme tokens and ambient styling include non-blue accent color(s) and multiple different blue hues, which conflicts with a strict single-accent-blue constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/main.tsx (and other listed paths).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates frontend/src/main.tsx was modified, which violates the "immutable paths must not be edited" constraint.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-19..REQ-23 and not necessary for the redesign requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a redeploy marker mechanism to force bundle hash changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the landing page redesign requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer attribution link with caffeine.ai UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the redesign requirements and introduces new outbound tracking behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated HTML page title and favicon reference.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested by the redesign requirements provided.
